description: This file defines a Flask route for a health check endpoint, utilizing Flask-Smorest's Blueprint and Flask's MethodView to create a simple health check API response.

classes.name: HealthCheck
classes.description: A Flask view class handling the health check endpoint, returning a JSON message indicating service health status.

methods.name: get(self)
methods.description: Handles GET requests to the health check endpoint, returning a JSON with a 'Healthy' message.

ctags.name: blp
ctags.pattern: /^blp = Blueprint("Healt Check", "health check", url_prefix="\/", description="Health check route"/

fields.name: blp = Blueprint("Healt Check", "health check", url_prefix="\/", description="Health check route"/
